attributes.action: We want the press to back of with bad publicity for Staffies
attributes.additional_details: The press are giving the Staffordshire Bull Terrier to much bad publicity.  This needs to stop.  The press need to either stop publish bad related stuff on this breed, or start to publish about other breeds as well.
attributes.background: We need to stand up for our lovable Staffies and make everyone aware that these dogs are not dangerous, it is the owner that are dangerous by not looking, treating or training their Staffies in the correct manner.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament aren't responsible for what the press choose to print. 

If you want to make a complaint about specific articles, you could contact the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), which regulates the UK newspaper industry. You can find out more here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
